attributes.action: Save The Civic Hall in Winsford, Cheshire from becoming a car park!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is happening to culture and the arts when a Popular Venue that Turns its council a profit and is attended regularly, opening 7 days a week is planned to be closed in January 2009. It is going to become a Car Park for the Town Centre that is situated next to it!!! After loosing the nearest Cinema in 2006 to Chains 15 miles away do we really want to loose this theatre/dance hall/function venue too!!
There is surely other plans for parking that could be made such as turning the car park across the road in to a multi-story one. Please don't take this Venue from us which has had some famous names sell out its seating and continues to be so very popular. Get the council to listern to the peoples oppinion and to survey for alternatives!!!
